name: Lego Ghost Path File
summary: A GHB file is a ghost path file created by Lego Racers, a racing video game. It contains the path of a time trial race, which includes the starting position of the racer and the waypoints that the racer follows. GHB files are referenced by the game when a player wants to race against a previous race time in time trial mode.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
